definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: According to the story, the practice of hanging up stockings is connected with St. Nicholas.
sentences.chinese: 据传，悬挂袜子的习俗与圣尼古拉有关。

sentences.english: Good socks have good foot type.
When her mother insisted she had to get something, Clarissa asked for socks.
sentences.chinese: 当她妈妈坚持让她选件礼物时，她要了袜子。

sentences.english: Players may wear a pair of thick socks and lights, soft-soled running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 参加者可穿一对厚袜子及轻而鞋底较软的跑鞋。

sentences.english: Yeah that's right. I might be a metaphorical sock.
sentences.chinese: 对，就是这个意思我可能，比方说，就是一只袜子。

sentences.english: An old hot coffee pot is on the sock.
sentences.chinese: 袜子上有一个热的旧咖啡壶。

sentences.english: The child put on his socks wrong side out.
He put his socks inside out.
And she started dyeing her stockings and blouses there too.
sentences.chinese: 同时在宿舍里边，她开始用颜料染着袜子和上衣。

sentences.english: Oh, he's a White Sox fan?
sentences.chinese: 哦，他是白袜子队的球迷？

sentences.english: Several confidantes talked about Dennis's socks.
sentences.chinese: 他的一些好朋友谈到了他的袜子。

sentences.english: He unpacked his 72-hourbag, then repacked it. Did he have enough toothpaste and spare socks?
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的牙膏和备用的袜子吗？

sentences.english: Your socks should not change or modify the fit of the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 你的袜子应当不改变或限制你的鞋的适应度。

sentences.english: He tore other strips and bound them about his feet to serve for both moccasins and socks.
sentences.chinese: 此外，他又撕下几条，裹在脚上，代替鹿皮鞋和袜子。

sentences.english: I quickly put all the socks are washed over again.
sentences.chinese: 我很快把所有的袜子都洗了一遍。

sentences.english: We saw this with the sock algorithm a moment ago.
sentences.chinese: 我们前面看到了袜子算法。
